result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mario Alfonzo Binns

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Mario Alfonzo Binns not in court, in custody.  Attorney Luis Javier Irizarry Lugo appeared by video for Mario Alfonzo Binns.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD DUE TO COURT REPORTER AVAILABILITY.
Case in court for status conference. Court waives defendant's appearance. State is in compliance with victim notification.
Defense counsel informed the Court this case did not resolve in Branch 17 and requests resolution date. State to file Order to Produce.
Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 15.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 19, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Mario Alfonzo Binns not in court, in custody.  Attorney Luis Javier Irizarry Lugo appeared by video for Mario Alfonzo Binns.  Prosecuting attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD DUE TO COURT REPORTER AVAILABILITY.
Court waives defendant's appearance. Case in court for status conference. State is in compliance with victim notification.
Discussion held. Defendant has a felony matter (20CF4631) in Branch 17 that may resolve as a global resolution with this case. Defense counsel requests a status conference.
Case adjourned to Branch 15. 
This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Mario Alfonzo Binns appeared by video.  Attorney Luis Javier Irizarry Lugo in court by video for Mario Alfonzo Binns.  Prosecuting attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference. Discussion held. Defendant has a felony matter in Branch 17 and will be seeking a global offer and request the court to authorize transfer.
Court authorizes transfer to Branch 17 for purposes of a global resolution, if accepted. Case adjourned back to Branch 30.
Status conference scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Attorney Luis Javier Irizarry Lugo in court, defendant Mario Alfonzo Binns not in court, in custody.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for pretrial conference. Counsel was recently appointed. Case may resolve with a global resolution.  Case adjourned to Branch 15.  Status conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
State Public Defender - Order Appointing Counsel, received and filed.
**Public Defenders office contacted the Court stating this was filed in error.  Attorney Parent removed as counsel.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Court ordered no contact with All Kohls Department Stores
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Mario Alfonzo Binns in court with attorney Travis Schwantes.  Defendant Mario Alfonzo Binns in custody.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Mario Alfonzo Binns appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 19. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. Case is adjourned to Br. 19 for pretrial.   
This hearing may be streamed live through DACAST at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/21a87aec-ffb6-5325-fb81-55812563aa79  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Prior: 1535 North 17th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53205
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 7/27/22 @ 2:30p
